items.sentence: Tom and Mary were the only ones that were left.
Tom and Mary were the only ones who were saved.
Tom and Mary work together at the same company.
Tom and Mary worked in a coal mine as children.
I saw Tom stealing something out of your purse.
I see no point in continuing this conversation.
It sounds to me like you\'ve had enough of Tom.
Tom and Mary are thinking about buying a house.
Tom and Mary were standing close to each other.
Tom and his brother have very little in common.
Tom and his cousin went into business together.
Tom and his family say grace before every meal.
Tom couldn\'t think of a good place to hide it.
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to apologize.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to commit suicide.
Tom\'s dog woke him up a little after midnight.
Put this jacket on, and you\'ll be much warmer.
That boy over there is probably Tom\'s brother.
You can\'t be too careful when you drive a car.
You don\'t expect me to face Tom alone, do you?
